title: TVS Motor sales rise 6 pc in Sep
description: TVS Motor Company announced that its total sales in September rose by 6 percent compared to the same month last year, reaching 402,553 units. The company also stated that their overall two-wheeler sales for the previous month increased by 7 percent year-on-year, totaling 386,955 units, compared to 361,729 units in September 2022.
